short_summary: Aeronautical Multi-band and Value-Added Satellite Services
description: This solicitation is being issued by [Shared Services Canada] for the supply of Aeronautical Multi-band and Value-Added Satellite Services.This soliciation will result in one single contract to one single supplier and will be used by [Shared Services Canada] and / or other departments and agencies to provide shared services to one or more of its clients.
duration_in_months: There is a 3 year term, plus 4 additional 1 year options
